about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Deen Dayal & The Hive
about.description: Deen Dayal has spent over 20 years hand-tending Himalayan hives. Blending ancestral beekeeping with modern AI hive monitoring, he harvests honey that is pure, raw, and traceable to a single valley. Our mission is to empower local farmers with sustainable livelihoods, bring beekeeping education to schools, and deliver an ethical luxury honey to homes worldwide.
about.founderSubtitle: Deen Dayal — the "Bee Father of India"

whyUs.title: Why Choose Himalayan Blossom
whyUs.description: Pure, small-batch honey crafted with care — traceable to valley and harvest, ethically harvested, and presented in luxury packaging for a thoughtful unboxing.

purityTraceability.title: Purity & Traceability
purityTraceability.description: Raw, unfiltered honey sourced from named Himalayan valleys — each small batch is traceable back to the farm and seasonal harvest.

ethicalHarvesting.title: Ethical Harvesting
ethicalHarvesting.description: Sustainable beekeeping methods protect pollinators and wild ecosystems, ensuring gentle extraction that preserves every natural enzyme.

wildBotanicals.title: Wild Botanicals
wildBotanicals.description: Each honey carries the floral signature of rare Himalayan botanicals — a terroir-driven tasting journey across valleys and elevations.

wellnessScience.title: Wellness Backed by Science
wellnessScience.description: Every variety is lab-tested for potency — from immune support to adaptogenic benefits, each jar is a functional wellness ritual.

communityImpact.title: Community Impact
communityImpact.description: Pre-orders support farmer training, AI-assisted hive monitoring, and school programs that inspire the next generation of beekeepers.

luxuryPackaging.title: Luxury Packaging & Exclusive Batches
luxuryPackaging.description: Hand-numbered jars, natural-linen labels, wooden lids and a wax-sealed story-tag — every order is an experience.
